summary: (2012) Four of the biggest stories from the climbing world, told with humor, heart, and mind-bending action. La Dura Dura (The Hard Hard) The Shark's Fin Wide Boyz Honnold 3.0
cast: Conrad Anker|Jimmy Chin|Sasha DiGiulian|Alex Honnold|Daila Ojeda|Adam Ondra|Renan Ozturk|Tom Randall|Chris Sharma|Pete Whittaker
director: Directors: Chris Alstrin, Jimmy Chin | 7 more credits Â»
title: Reel Rock 7
